item.title: Datascape Podcast - December Cloud Update
item.description: I had a great discussion with my friends on the Datascape Podcast to discuss latest cloud updates. In this episode, Warner (Azure), yours truly -> Stephane (GCP), Pierig (AWS) and Chris discuss several interesting cloud updates released on the public cloud(s) over the last few months. Link to episode: Episode 38 - December Cloud Update Enjoy!

item.title: Datascape Podcast - August Cloud Update
item.description: I sat down with my friends on the Datascape Podcast to discuss latest cloud updates. In this episode, Warner (Azure), yours truly -> Stephane (GCP), Pierig (AWS) and Chris discuss several interesting cloud updates released on the public cloud(s) over the last few months. Link to episode: Episode 36 - August Cloud Update Enjoy!

item.title: Copying data to the Cloud from the Command line
item.description: Copying data to the Cloud from the Command line, this is what this post is all about. Over the last couple of years we have seen vendors offering different object storage platforms/services in the Cloud. Cloud storage typically refers to a hosted object storage service! The following are considered the most known and used Cloud Object Storage platforms and we are going to demonstrate how to copy data to each from the command line.
